message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO 

This paper proposes a method for motion prediction in single still images by learning it from a set of videos. The proposed method involves learning local motion patterns given a specific appearance and adding the predicted motion in a number of applications. This work is related to computer vision (cs.CV) as it deals with image analysis and motion prediction. The method involves regression derived from first principles, which is related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The applications of the proposed method include action recognition and motion saliency, which are related to multimedia (cs.MM). The method can also be applied to robotics (cs.RO) for tasks such as object tracking.
